entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 4 April 2023
